description: With plum jam, ginger, Chinese five-spice and chilli flakes, this roast pork shoulderwith a sticky spiced crust is the perfect mix of sweet and spicy.
keywords: Rolled Pork Shoulder with Sticky Spice Crust
name: Rolled Pork Shoulder with Sticky Spice Crust Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine butter and flour in a small bowl to make a paste. Place roasting pan with pan juices on the stove over medium heat. Bring to the boil. Add butter mixture and whisk until combined and sauce thickens slightly. Slice pork and serve with sauce and broccolini.
